name: House Ideas for Minecraft
description:
House Ideas for Minecraft is the ultimate How-to Guide for Building cool looking houses in Minecraft. Its great for creative or survival mode. Each video shows building in real time. Some of the topics covered include:

- How to make a working shower in Minecraft using redstone
- How to make a working bathtub
- Building modern style houses
- Minecraft Village Transformation: Get ideas on house makeovers for Villagers
- Village Church Transformation : Turn a crude Villager Church into a modern looking cool Church
- Mountain Top House
- Furnishing and Decorating, only using vanilla components
- Quick to build survival houses that look great
- Large mansions
- Swimming pools

Note that an internet connection is required to stream videos.

This app is an unofficial guide and is not endorsed by or associated with Mojang AB or Microsoft.
